thread.section_title: Sweet Little Babies Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Sweet Little Babies | sweetlittlebabies.com
thread.title: Kerry Flood
thread.title_full: Sweet Little Babies reviewed by Kerry Flood

author: Kerry Flood
title: Kerry Flood
text: We won a Groclock from Sweet Little Babies and it is brilliant. My children love it. I recommend it. It has a farm story book to read for children's bedtime and the Groclock lets children know when it is time to get up with sun symbol and stars for night. You can set the time and it has a wake up alarm. I would highly recommend this product as it is a fun for children to learn and parents have their children wake up at a decent hour.
